Kirkland.Broadmoor Golf Club, Seattle:
Broadmoor Golf Club is a private golf club in the northwest United States in Seattle, Washington, founded 94 years ago in 1924 and opened for play in April 1927. It is located in the Broadmoor neighborhood of Seattle, just south of the University of Washington and west of Lake Washington.
Broadmoor is a tribute to designer/builder A. Vernon "Mac" Macan, a leading golf course architect of the time.
